meanings.sent1: She commends her friend for always being kind.
meanings.sent2: The teacher commends the student for completing the project on time.
meanings.sent3: The cat commends the dog for finding its favorite toy.
meanings.sent4: The sun commends the flowers for blooming beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The coach commends the team for their hard work and dedication.

meanings.definition: To entrust for care or safekeeping
meanings.sent1: He commends his precious belongings to his sister while he is away.
meanings.sent2: The museum commends the valuable artifacts to the expert conservator.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel commends its acorns to the tree for safekeeping.
meanings.sent4: The captain commends the ship to the experienced crew during the storm.
meanings.sent5: The parent commends the child to the babysitter for the evening.
